alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Bradford, northwestern Alachua, southern Baker, Union, southeastern Columbia, northwestern Clay, western Duval and south central Charlton Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Macclenny to near Providence. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Butler, Raiford, Worthington Spring, Columbia, Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Worthington Springs, Palestine Community, Maxville and Groves. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Duval
